page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT (2)
page.content: {ENGINEERING}In the Fords factory men and women are employed. The women make the seat covers for the wire framework out of leather and cloth. The men attach the parts of the car together on the assembly line. As well as men and women working in Fords there are robots as well. These mainly work on the assembly lines, lifting the heavy parts of the car and welding them together. There is also a section of the factory which makes the engines and gearboxes. {BANKING}The main branch of banks in Speke are TSB -{Trustee Savings Bank in the Parade, and in some schools there is school bank in which the children put in money and draw it out at a certain times. The old{TSB}has been replaced by a new{TSB}with a cash dispenser.
